::: In the chared remains of TRANSANULAS' lair, a small diagnostic droid 
shoots into the air. ( the small orb drone that helps megatron n Beast 
Machines. ) His two red eyes come to life and he flaots around the room. :::

::: He speaks ::: Ah, the body is a bit constricting, but nothing to bad. 
Yes. But, I least I have survived!

::: MEGATRON now inhabited the small body. His spark transfer was a success. 
He would endure ::: Now, with my new form, I can infiltrate Hell Beast's ship 
as a spy. Acting like his advisor...I will lead him to doom!

::: He shoots out of the lair, and towrds the battle to see what had happened 
the brief period he was " dead " :::
